bug_is_private_msg: Contact the Bug author to be added as a collaborator.
bug_name_pick: Choose a name for this Bug
bug_not_found_msg: The requested Bug could not be found on the server. It may have been deleted.

invalid_username_msg: Usernames must be at least 3 characters and may only contain lowercase letters, numbers and underscores.

user_exists_msg: An account with this username or email already exists.
